eb97bbbdaafe807efa9e90b7","dweb:/ipfs/QmSkY1EdbmfYGTQZDMZCs4Dp9JGiVrKMutpzqpNaLgcbzx"]}},"version":1}

activateCampaign(uint256).details: Activate a campaign to allow donations

params._campaignId: ID of the campaign to activate Only verifiers can activate a campaign after verification

params._verifier: Address of the verifier to add

constructor.details: Constructor adds the contract deployer as the first verifier

returns._0: uint256 The ID of the created campaign NGOs call this to initiate a new fundraising campaign

deactivateCampaign(uint256).details: Deactivate a campaign to pause donations

params._campaignId: ID of the campaign to deactivate Only verifiers can deactivate a campaign

returns._0: Campaign struct containing all campaign details

getCampaignGoal(uint256).details: Get the funding goal for a campaign

getCampaignNGO(uint256).details: Get the NGO address associated with a campaign

getNGOCampaigns(address).details: Get all campaigns created by an NGO

isCampaignActive(uint256).details: Check if a campaign is active for donations

returns._0: bool Whether the campaign is active

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pause().details: Pause the contract Only owner can pause the contract

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

params._verifier: Address of the verifier to remove

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unpause().details: Unpause the contract Only owner can unpause the contract

params._campaignId: ID of the campaign to verify Verifiers call this after reviewing campaign details and NGO credentials
